content.en_US:
A low-energy-density medium-grade fuel made from [[industrial oil|Industrial Oil]]. Industrial oil is processed in the [[chemical plant|Chemical Plant]] to produce reclaimed industrial oil. Then the reclaimed oil is mixed with lubricant in the [[industrial mixer|Industrial Mixer]] to produce petroil.

Petroil can be further mixed with [[tetraethyllead|Tetraethyllead]] to produce leaded petroil.
